level.heading: Contracting authority.
level.text: The Mayor may select 1 or more contractors to provide services as may be part of the defined contribution plan under § 1-626.05(3). Any contract under § 1-626.05(2) and (3) shall be in accordance with the provisions of Chapter 3 of Title 2.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 7-27
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 7-27, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-621.02.

level.heading: Mayor's orders
level.text: Establishment of Pension Benefit Committee: See Mayor's Order 89-235, October 5, 1989.
